common.bannercargo: Delivery is provided to all parts of Turkey through contracted cargo companies.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

about.title: About Us
about.content1: There are 3 different flat options in our facility, which consists of 19 flats in total.
about.content2: You can choose from garden duplex, middle floor and roof duplex options.
about.content3: There is a jacuzzi on the large terrace of our roof duplex apartments.
about.content4: Our garden duplex apartments have a private pool for you.
about.content5: There is a common pool for all our guests in our facility.
about.content6: All apartments have kitchen and kitchen equipment.
about.content7: All apartments have a washing machine, dishwasher and dryer.
about.content8: You have free access to our private beach, YalÄ± Beach, which is 3 kilometers away from the sea.
about.content9: Check-in time is 15.00 at noon and check-out time is 11.00 noon to our apartments.
